SELECT W.WO_NO , W.WO_CODE , W.PDT_CODE , W.PRC_CODE , W.ORDER_DATE , W.WO_QTY -- , S.MS_STATUS , W.STATUS , W.DUE_DATE , W.COMMENTS , W.USE_YN , W.WO_START_DATE , W.WO_END_DATE , P.PDT_NAME , E.EMP_NAME
FROM WORK_ORDER W JOIN PRODUCTS P ON W.PDT_CODE = P.PDT_CODE JOIN EMPLOYEES E ON W.EMP_ID = E.EMP_ID -- JOIN MFG_SCHEDULES S ON W.WO_CODE = S.MS_CODE ORDER BY WORK_ORDER_NO DESC

SELECT S.MS_NO , S.MS_CODE , S.PDT_CODE , P.PDT_NAME , S.ALLOCATED_QTY , S.MS_START_DATE , S.MS_END_DATE , S.EMP_ID , S.MS_PRIORITY , S.MS_STATUS , S.MS_UPDATED_AT , S.PRC_CODE , S.MP_CODE , S.MS_QTY , S.PDT_PRC_TYPE_CODE FROM MFG_SCHEDULES S JOIN PRODUCTS P ON S.PDT_CODE = P.PDT_CODE WHERE MS_STATUS != '대기중' ORDER BY S.MS_NO DESC
